msbt.message: Whenever I come here, I always want to buy stuff I always I don't need.But once your place is so full of stuff that you can't walk around in it you learn self-control!
Find anything good? If I get bored, I so love to come here and browse. Free entertainment!
This store is so warm and cozy sometimes I find a quiet corner and take a nap!

Browsing the cute accessories and sparkly knickknacks gets me SOOO hyped!It's, like, someday I'll be ONSTAGE, singing, dancing, and wearing sparkly stuff just like this!It just makes me feel so imminently famous so way deep down inside, you know?!
What kind of stuff do you usually buy, ?Me? I always go for the sparkliest thing on the shelf!But that stuff's not always, you know, useful So I always have to come back and buy useful stuff.
Isn't this store uhhhhMAZING? I shop here all. The. Time!
Find anything good?I love to shop on other islands! It's all the same kind of stuff we have at home<10_4 />but DIFFERENT!

Ohmigosh! Did you come to see the brand-new Nook's Cranny too, ?! It's SO FAB! There's so much stuffwhich means there's so much stuff to stare at while I window-shop!I'm so excited I might scream<10_4 /> GAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!<10_4 /> Like that, !

OHMIGOSH! I heard Nook's Cranny had been remodeled, and I totes panicked, !I'm the island's trendsetter, and I needednoI NEEDED to be on the scene and in the KNOW! Like, STAT!I was here before sunup. It freaked Timmy out that I was sleeping in front of the store's doors.But I did it, ! I got inside and I burned every detail into my brain! Every perfect detail!

Timmy did an amazetastic job with this store, !Nook's Cranny could win the Trendy Island Store Pageant, paws down!If a shop's stylish AND le trend-o, like the new Nook's Cranny, it makes shopping so much morevisceral.
